property.name: Keywords
property.value: The Ghost

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are the leader, your dudes without Weapons have -1 bullets.Shootout, Boot: Attach a Non-Unique Weapon from your hand to one of your non-token dudes.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ol' One Eye

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are the leader, you must choose your highest grit dude in your posse as your shooter.Resolution, Boot: If your posse only contains a single dude, and that dude has at least 1 printed influence, that dude gains Harrowed for this shootout round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Ace Reporter

property.name: Text
property.value: Card effects cannot cause cards to leave your discard pile, and cards in your discard pile cannot be played.During Sundown, discard all cards in your hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: The Haint has +2 influence during the Upkeep phase.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: Repeat Noon: Pay an opponent 1 ghost rock to move Rock to town square.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Blessed 1

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After Arielle boots to use an ability on a Miracle, unboot her.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Blessed 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase Gabriel's Blessed skill checks by the number of your other dudes at this location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Pay 1 Ghost Rock, Boot: Discard a deed from your play hand to put an in-town deed from your discard pile into your play hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harlan is a stud while at a Ranch.Shootout: If this shootout is at a Ranch, Harlan joins your posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot Delphi or her Gadget to make a Mad Scientist skill check against an opposing dude's grit. If successful, choose an ability printed on that dude. That dude cannot use the ability until after the Sundown phase.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Mad Scientist 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot Cooper's Gadget to pull. If the Gadget is Experimental make an additional pull. For each pull, if it is a: * Diamond, draw a card then discard a card* Heart, Cooper gains +2 bullets* Spade, Coop gains +1 influence* Club, boot Cooper

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: If Vivene has a Mystical goods, she is a stud.Shootout, Boot: Discard one of Vivene's Mystical goods to choose an opposing dude with grit lower than that goods' value. Send that dude home booted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: If there are no studs in your posse, choose an opposing dude. That dude becomes a draw.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have no dudes in Boot Hill, Bogie Man has +1 influence.Bogie Man gains a bullet bonus equal to the highest printed influence in any Boot Hill.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: If Evan Lucas is in your posse, you gain 1 ghost rock whenever an opposing dude is aced.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark the town square. If successful, choose a dude or deed in your discard pile and play it, lowering the cost by 2, to a minimum of 1.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Shaman 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot Tsintah's Spirit or a Totem at this location to make her a stud. If this location is Holy Ground, or is a deed adjacent to Holy Ground, Tsintah gets +1 bullets.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Kung Fu 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Jackie cannot have non-Melee Weapons attached.While Jackie is the only dude in your posse, he has +4 value and is a stud.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark an opposing dude. Speaks-with-Buffalo becomes a stud. When forming draw hands this shootout, all dudes use their influence instead of bullets to determine how many cards each player draws (but keep their bullet types). If successful, unboot Speaks-with-Buffalo, draw 2 cards, and then discard 2 cards.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Send an opposing dude at this location with more bounty than influence home booted. That dude's owner may reduce that dude's bounty to 0.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Blessed 0-Deputy

property.name: Text
property.value: Joan has -1 bullets for each other dude in her posse.Joan cannot flee or be sent home from a shootout.Joan's attached cards cannot affect opposing dudes unless they have bounty higher than their influence.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution: Choose up to three bounty on dudes in the opposing posse. If your hand is legal, you may choose up to five bounty. Lower your opponent's hand rank by that amount. Your opponent may remove the chosen bounty.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Caves has -1 bullets and -1 influence for each bounty he has.Noon: If Caves is at a Public location, discard a card to reduce his bounty by 1.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Charlie has a +1 value for each bounty he has.While Charlie's bounty is greater than 3, he cannot be changed to a draw.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot Tomas's Hex to make a Huckster skill check against the value of an opposing Weapon. If successful, discard both the booted Hex and the Weapon.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job, Boot: Mark an in-town location Pete is not at. If successful, choose an Attire or non-Unique Weapon in your discard pile and attach it to one of your dudes, booted (paying all costs). If that dude attached a Weapon and has no bounty, raise their bounty by 1.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 2-Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: If your outfit is Outlaws, Jonah's cost is reduced by the number of different Hexes you control.Other wanted dudes in Jonah's posse have +1 bullets.Noon/Shootout: Discard an opponent's attached card at this location with cost equal to or less than Jonah's bounty. Raise the bounty of your dude at this location by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After Camillus enters play during High Noon, one of your other dudes becomes a stud.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harrowed-Gadget 6-Mystical

property.name: Text
property.value: QUATERMAN PRIME must be invented, and enters play at the Mad Scientist's location.QUATERMAN PRIME'S bullets cannot be modified except by his attached goods. Cards cannot boot or move QUATERMAN PRIME. Each time a player reveals a cheatin' hand in QUATERMAN PRIME'S shootout, that player takes an additional casualty.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Shaman 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Pay 1 Ghost Rock, Boot: Discard an opposing Sidekick.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Nicole is wanted, she has +3 bullets.When Nicole is wanted, her influence is reduced to 0.React: After you win lowball, reduce Nicole's bounty to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution, Boot: If your hand is legal, boot your dude at this deed to prevent all casualties this round. Dudes cannot flee this round. In the next round of the shootout, double the number of casualties inflicted.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Core-Private-Holy Ground

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After victory is checkec during Sundown, move your dude to town square.

property.name: Text
property.value: Abomination dudes at this location have +1 bullets and +1 influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If that has the same value or suit as the top card in their discard pile, gain 1 ghost rock. If a joker is revealed, ace it and reveal the next card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Public-Out of Town

property.name: Text
property.value: The player who controls Jonah's Retreat collects its production.

property.name: Text
property.value: When forming draw hands during shootouts at this location, all dudes use their influence instead of bullets to determine how many cards each player draws (but keep their bullet type).

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude is a stud.Repeat Shootout: Boot this dude's Hex. This dude gets +1 bullets or +1 Huckster skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: This dude gets +1 bullets. If you reveal a legal draw hand this round, hand ranks can only be modified by traits and Cheatin' Resolutions. Discard this card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Horse-Gadget 4

property.name: Text
property.value: If Iron Mole is at an Out of Town deed, increase that deed's production by 1.Noon, Boot: Move this dude to an Out of Town deed.Shootout, Boot: If this dude is at an Out of Town deed, this dude joins your posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Noon, Boot: Move this dude to an Out of Town deed. || Shootout, Boot: If this dude is at an Out of Town deed, this dude joins your posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Weapon-Gadget 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: This dude makes a Mad Scientist skill check against an opposing dude's value. If successful, discard this card and and make that dude a draw.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Scratch is discarded from play, discard a card to draw a card.Noon/Shootout, Boot: Move Scratch to another of your dudes at an adjacent location.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After a Hymn is successfully cast at this location, this dude gains +1 influence.Noon, Boot: Discard this card to give an opposing dude at this location -2 bullets.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: React, Boot: After a Hymn is successfully cast at this location, this dude gains +1 influence. || Noon, Boot: Discard this card to give an opposing dude at this location -2 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Hex 7, Boot: Reduce an opposing dude's bullets by this dude's influence. If that dude has 0 bullets, this dude gets +1 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex X, Boot: X is the grit of an unbooted dude at this or an adjacent location. At sundown, that dude does not unboot unless their controller pays 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon/Shootout Hex 6, Boot: Boot a spell attached to a dude at this location. If this is a shootout, the spell must be in the opposing posse.Noon Hex 6, Boot: Choose a dude at this location. Until after Sundown, that dude's influence is set to 1 (and cannot be modified).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Miracle 8, Boot: After choosing your shooter this round, up to four dudes in your Boot Hill contribute bullets to your draw and stud bonus (as back-up dudes). Your dudes cannot flee the shootout this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: React Miracle 6: After another Miracle boots your dude,unboot that dude.Shootout Miracle 7, Boot: Boot this dude to boot an opposing card.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: React Miracle 6: After another Miracle boots your dude, unboot that dude. || Shootout Miracle 7, Boot: Boot this dude to boot an opposing card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Spirit 8, Boot: Ace a card from your hand. An Ancestor Spirit enters play at this location and joins your posse. Cheatin' Resolution Spirit 6, Boot: An Ancestor Spirit enters play at this location and joins your posse.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Shootout Spirit 8, Boot: Ace a card from your hand. An Ancestor Spirit enters play at this location and joins your posse. || Cheatin' Resolution Spirit 6, Boot: An Ancestor Spirit enters play at this location and joins your posse.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Spirit 8, Boot: Move all of your unbooted dudes at this location to another location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot your dude to choose a number of opposing dudes equal to your dude's bullet rating. Each chosen dude with 0 printed bullets becomes a draw. Each chosen dude gets -1 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: During shootouts at this location, the losing posse takes an additional casualty.Each player gains the ability: \Noon Job: Mark the town square. If successful, discard a number of attached Tumblebleeds! equal to the number of dudes in your posse.\ Noon: Boot your Huckster to attach this card to town square.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Give one of your dudes -1 bullets. That dude cannot be chosen as a casualty this round unless you lose this shootout round by 3 or more ranks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: One of your dudes joins your posse (moving if necessary). If that dude has a Sidekick, you may make another shootout play with one of that dude's attached cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Move your unbooted in-town dude to town square and boot them. Your opponent must either give that dude 1 permanent control point, or move one of their in-town dudes to town square and call out that dude. No other dudes may join this shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution Technique: Draw a card. You may send a dude at this location home booted. If this is a shootout, reduce your casualties by 1 and increase your opponent's casualties by 1. If your hand is legal, this dude gets +1 bullets and +1 influence until Sundown.
